attributes.action: Apologise to the people of Scotland for the conduct of Edward I in his illegal invasions of Scotland and murder of William Wallace, the Guardian of Scotland
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Now that the Prime Minister has set the ball in motion by publicly apologising for the actions of our ancestors in the Slave Trade (a trade which we the current citizens of Britain had nothing to do with) we request that he formally apologise to the people of Scotland for the conduct of Edward I (a predecessor of the Monarch in whose name he exerts executive office) in his illegal invasions of Scotland and his murder of Sir William Wallace the Guardian of Scotland.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
